titleInfo.title: Christian Brothers College Souvenir Program: Grand Opening and Dedication, New Administration Building

mods.abstract: The opening of Christian Brothers Collelge's new administration building in 1950 was welcomed with religious and secular celebrations on April 30 and May 1, 1950. The CBC Mothers Club hosted a reception, and the Bishop of the Diocese of Nashville, Reverend William L. Adrian officiated at the dedication.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
